title: Introduction to French Greetings
description: Learn the most common ways to greet people in French.
learningObjectives: Learn to say hello and goodbye.
Understand the difference between formal and informal greetings.

sections.title: Why Greetings Matter
sections.content: In France, politeness is very important. Using the correct greeting is the first step to having a good conversation.

sections.title: Common Greetings
sections.content: Here are the most essential greetings you need to know.

sections.title: Summary
sections.content: You've now learned the basic French greetings. Practice them every day!

culturalNotes.title: La Bise
culturalNotes.content: It is common for friends and family in France to greet each other with a kiss on the cheek, known as 'la bise'.
